mapper.select: select notice.notice_id, notice.school_id, notice.title, notice.notice_time, notice.classification, notice.info_from from notice where classification=#{classification} ORDER by notice_time desc limit #{pageInfo.pageNum},#{pageInfo.pageSize}

select notice.*, school.school_name, school.head, file_download.file_url, file_download.name, file_download.file_type, file_download.file_size from notice left join file_belong on file_belong.belong_type='N' and file_belong.belong_id=notice.notice_id left join file_download on file_download.file_hash = file_belong.file_hash and file_download.file_type NOT IN ('jpg','jpeg','jpe','png','pns') left join school on notice.school_id = school.school_id where notice.notice_id=#{noticeId} ORDER BY file_download.file_date ASC
select notice.notice_id, notice.school_id, notice.title, notice.notice_time, notice.classification, notice.info_from from notice ORDER by notice_time desc limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update notice set good_num = good_num + 1 where notice_id = #{noticeId};
update notice set read_num = read_num + 1 where notice_id = #{noticeId};
update notice set good_num = good_num-1 where notice_id = #{noticeId}
